text.section: Happy Summer! Six lovely months in San Francisco passed like a flash with new work for Lucky NYC, Goodby Silverstein, Leroy and Clarkson, EVB, and Social Control.

Back in San Francisco and it feels comfy like a home should. Lately been keeping busy with local EVB and Little Red Robot, but am available for future bookings both here and away. Yay for the Best Coast!
Returning to the US soon, but not yet to California. I just signed on to work onsite at The Mill in NYC for the month of December. See you in New York?
Just found out that Current Green won a Merit Award and will be featured in the How Magazine 2011 Interactive Design Annual. I am super excited!
Arriving back to the USA on November 29, return is set! See you back in California soon!

My work is to be included in the upcoming ArtCrank poster show in San Francisco! I will be living in Berlin, Germany from Sept-Nov and sadly missing the excitement back home. Perhaps you can be there instead? www.artcrankpostershow.com/san-francisco
Leaving for a week in Mexico City. In the meantime, enjoy some new updated boards and contact me if you would like to work together in mid-July!

Busy couple months doing work for Buck, BNS NY, Social Control, Roger, The Mill, The History Channel and others. Viva la freelance! A few new boards to show, a few coming soon. PLUS see .mov at vimeo.com/calcium75 and personal work at meghantosh.com

NEW REEL IS UP, visions and revisions be damned! Lately? I edited four trailers to support www.storiesofhealth.org and I have been designing and letterpressing a series of greeting cards which will be available soon.

Excitement! Two weeks notice and heartfelt goodbye to Current TV, I will soon be back to the freewheeling, freelancing lifestyle! I am accepting bookings for October and a new reel is forthcoming - I promise. Lots of great new work to show!
On February 28th I will be competing live in motion design at Cut and Paste. I have never been in a designer death match -- wish me luck! Or better yet, get tix for the SF match at cutandpaste.com
Updates! New design I have done in the last couple months for Stardust, Roger, Digital Kitchen and Grand Jetee. Reel update soon.
I have landed at Current TV in a long term freelance graphic design position since mid-april. Love it here, but still keeping up with the night and weekend freelance board design jobs.
UPDATES! So much new work to see below. It looks like San Francisco wins. You can find me there or on the internet.

BIG CHANGES! Finally left LA. My stuff is in a storage cube, and I will be in either San Francsico, Portland, or Minneapolis for the next couple months. I am actively looking for additional remote freelance design and animation work. Contact me!
Spent a nice two months at Yu and Co in Hollywood this January and February. Lots of new work to add soon.
Back in the USA!
Just started another stint with the wonderful folks at Logan. I will be here until mid-December and then heading to Tokyo for two weeks. It is good to be back in Venice Beach.

Back from South America! Contemporary design in Buenos Aires and pre-columbian Peruvian textile design have me totally inspired. After getting sick I left early to make use of all this inspiration in the comfort of LA with my computer, my boy, and my cats.

Here is the new site design! There will be many improvements in the next week, including a new cut of my reel with a matching intro and an update to my resume. In the meantime, check the other stuff out...
It is my last week of several lovely weeks at Framework and I am off to Peru. I return Oct 17!

I just registered www.mybicyclefriend.com to celebrate all things bicycle. I love riding my bike to work and want to encourage everyone to do so! Look for some cool design, animation, and forums in the coming weeks.
